profile:
Why choose The Renovators of Canada?  
 
For over the past 20 years our focus on customer experience has helped The Renovators of Canada grow to locations in Durham, Aurora, Stouffville, Markham, Vaughan, Toronto, Hamilton, Guelph, Kitchener, Waterloo, Barrie, Oshawa, Oakville and Cambridge. 
 
Unique to the industry, The Renovators of Canada provides a 10 year warranty on all craftsmanship. This home renovation warranty protection was established to provide peace of mind as home and business owners contemplate renovating a personal or commercial space. 
 
T-ROC is a fully licensed and insured including WSIB. Other affiliations include memberships with the National Kitchen and Bath Association, CARAHS, Better Business Bureau.  
 
We have a proven track record working with our customers with full transparency in every aspect of your project.  Can’t be present all the time during the renovation process?  No worries, we have specialized client software that allows you to see the entire schedule and pictures as the project happens in real time. We care for your home like it’s our own and always conduct ourselves respectfully and professionally.  
 
With our motivated and innovative professionals we will transform your house and make your dream home a reality.  Visit our website at www.trocanada.com

profile: Welcome to Integrity Contracting Corp. We are a quality Home Additions, framing and Custom Homes Construction company that delivers projects on time, on budget and in quality way at a fair and reasonable market price. Serving Toronto and the GTA. And now serving the Innisfil-Barrie area ABOUT US Find us on Facebook! The majority of our business comes from word of mouth and repeated business thanks to consistent customer satisfaction. We achieve this through practicing exquisite attention to detail and excellence in customer service. Our mission statement includes preserving our level of integrity, professionalism, honesty and fairness in our relationships with our customers. Our services include: *New Homes Framing *Water Proofing *Excavation *Post & Beam Timber Construction *Framing & Timber Frames *Demolition *Home Additions *Decks & Fences *Commercial Wood Roof Systems *Glue-Lam Structures *I.C.F foundation *Undepinning
service_area: Toronto, Vaughan, Woodbridge, Concord, Richmond Hill, Etobicoke
products:

profile:
TRIT Homes is a top-tier design and renovation firm that services Toronto and the GTA.

Our team of experienced professionals holds a wide variety of custom concepts and designs that have been perfectly executed to the client’s vision, timeline, and price point. Quality and care are just some of the characteristics that TRIT Homes Remodeling applies to every project. 

Our commitment to excellence is what will separate TRIT Homes from other home remodelers. Please connect with us today to discuss your home improvement design, remodel or rebuild.


We look forward to collaborating with you.
